website_summaries.verdict: Quality-made, breathable and eye-catching short-sleeved biking jersey in non-fade color pattern.
pros: Made from 80 percent polyester and 20 percent Lycra
Never sticks to even the sweatiest skin
Made by company that specializes in manufacturing various other athletic wear
cons: The shirts run small, so consumers should be mindful to order larger-than-normal size

customer_reviews.title: I get lots of compliments on the way they look
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased six of these jerseys in medium, and 2 of them were purchased as sets with shorts. They fit great on an athletic build, are very good quality, wash well, and provide excellent value. The designs are appealing and they styles are flattering. I get lots of compliments on the way they look. I should also mention, that product fulfillment is fast, and when I had an issue with one of the items, customer service was outstanding and everything was completely resolved in a manner which exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousTop Contributor: Coffee Roasting

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This jersey feels too big and if you put stuff in the rear pockets, the weight pull it back which makes it uncomfortable. Thinking it was just to large, I bought the next size down and while sits well on the body, the sleeves are extremely tight making it even worse. Material and general quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Eli T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jersey
customer_reviews.text: I wear size Large US, and I bought a size 3XL and it fits just right. Material is a bit too light but it will hold.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: good quality/ good price
customer_reviews.text: ordered this as a gift for my boyfriend, as we cycle together and he loves it. He wears it all the time and washes it frequently and it has held up. It breaths well and he says it fits like a glove. He usually wears a small and I ordered him a medium, based on reviews that it runs small. The color has not faded and it seems to stay in place while riding/ doesn't ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!! But run VERY small!!!
customer_reviews.text: The material was awesome and the 5th was great but runs extremely small. I normally wear a medium in US size but I had to order an XXL Asia/XL US and it barely fit. But it fit good. Make sure you pay attention to the chart
customer_reviews.author: Julio C. Flores

customer_reviews.title: These Are The Best For Recreational Riders
customer_reviews.text: I like the prices, quality and fit of Sponeed products. Just be sure to read the sizing recommendations and get one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knows - Usually :-)

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be made well but I can't be objective since the jersey just doesn't fit. I have a 47" chest but the largest size I could find (Asia 3XL) wouldn't even close. Evidently Sponeed doesn't think large bikers exist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Biking jersey!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite jersey for now. Time will tell. I ordered 3× normally xl this is how the scale works. Order big at least 2×> I say. Everyone is different. As for the jersey it feels really nice soft and sheds the persperation pretty good. Nice looking too! Seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and weigh 140 lb. I normally wear medium sizes. I ordered a large as the sizing info stated. The fit is perfect and comfortable to wear. I already have matching shorts so I love the colors. Great quality and fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. I wear a XL. Went with size chart for XL for USA was XXL. it was way too smal. I sent XXL back and got XXXL . Very nice shirt with zipper closure. Take note if you have muscular arms!! Great quality for price!! Love it!! Quick response on refund too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam7

customer_reviews.title: Great bike jersey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jersey for my son. He is 5'8/130 lbs and the Asia M=US small fit perfectly. He is happy with the color and quality of the product and I was happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Whaley

customer_reviews.title: A terrific bike shirt
customer_reviews.text: A terrific bike shirt. It is better than shirts that cost over $100. It is longer in front but runs small.
customer_reviews.author: TWODOG

customer_reviews.title: Super value in a Cycling Jersey
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good looking, great price! What else could you add for.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Barber

customer_reviews.title: I have worn the jersey twice and am completely satisfied. it's a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing guide (I normally wear a Medium, but ordered an X-Large) and the jersey fit perfectly. I have worn the jersey twice and am completely satisfied. it's a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spahr

customer_reviews.title: and is made of ridiculously poor material overall
customer_reviews.text: JUNK. This thing has a cheap plastic zipper, runs about three sizes smaller than advertised, and is made of ridiculously poor material overall. I sent it back five minutes after I opened it. Too bad, because it looks great in the pictures. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: jeff m.

customer_reviews.title: High quality bike jersey
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Comfortable (6' 1", 43" chest, 32" waist. )size XXL perfect fit. Sleeves not too tight. Rear three pockets deep but I prefer one being zippered. Quite visible to motorists.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: Nice jerzey, but runs very small. Large is usually slightly loose on me. Had to return the large and get an extra large, and that is still tight. Almost no difference between the two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Loden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 ft. 245 lbs. 50 inch shoulders and this shirt fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LarryH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price, but the zipper is plastic which constantly pops open or misaligns. Ended up throwing away the jersey, busted zipper
customer_reviews.author: Denny Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great value jersey
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and very comfortable. I like it better than some of my more expensive jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: Babak Nikoomanesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality of this jersey for the price. Really comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Pg

customer_reviews.title: sized wrong
customer_reviews.text: these jerseys are extremely undersized. I wear US large but needed an XXL jersey ( still a litle snug.)
customer_reviews.author: Mihalski

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Too smal. If you usually wear a large better buy xx large
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Keeps me dry and cool when riding
customer_reviews.author: E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Jersey for summer
customer_reviews.text: Great Jersey for summer. Light weight. The zipper zips from the left side like many women's button downs button from the left, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering the largest size but it's still too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great company, had the best customer service experience they actually help me had a better fitted jersey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product im 5.6 and 175lb i bought the size on medium and was a snug fit just how i like it its a great buy I recomend this product for anyone starting. fits feels and mostly looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality customer service!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product !! Outfit fit like a glove!! Ships super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second top that I have ordered the zipper separates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order Larger
customer_reviews.text: Order 1 American size larger than you normally would....glad I followed this advice
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Are you very much it fits great looks great well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it nice product I totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Osiel Castro

customer_reviews.title: Built for men with no biceps.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, but honestly if you're an average american man, (I'm 5'10) with any muscle in your biceps look elsewhere. The arms are unbelievably tight. the rest of it fits okay but that was the main problem. It was basically sized for a forearm instead of a bicep for the arm holes. Again, not a body builder here, but I have basic fitness. Order a size (or two?) up or just order american. Pros: breathable, has pockets, comfortable (except for my arms)
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke before I ever wore it. The company sent out a new one and made it right. Good jersey for the price and good service.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jersey! Great quality for the price! Fits a little smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberely J. Huitt

product_meta.title: sponeed Mens Bicycle Jersey T Shirt Cycling Top Breathable Light Style
feature_bullets: Tag size is Asian size that runs smaller than US normal,please check the size chart before you place order.We recommend one size larger to buy,that means if you wear US L please choose Asian XL
Wash with room temperature water, Do not brush or bleach, Please Cool iron. Put in wash pocket when wash in machine
Suitable for all levels cyclists. even you're sweaty the Jersey never adhere to your skin, quick-dry and make you feel more comfortable
Jersey made of 80% Polyester and 20% Lycra.Comfortable anatomic design with sublimation print(Using Italian Ink), never fade out. It's harmless to the skin
Different from other low price seller, We are cycling supplies factory that guarantee top-level quality and good design. We also can customize uniforms.
